languages.text: "Я следую приказу своего наставника, архимагоса Амарната, и исправляю ошибку, совершенную десятилетия назад".
"I am following the orders of my mentor, Archmagos Amarnat, and correcting a mistake made decades ago."
languages.original_text: "Я следую приказу своего наставника, архимагоса Амарната, и исправляю ошибку, совершенную десятилетия назад".

traits.locale_text: "I am following the orders of my mentor, Archmagos Amarnat, and correcting a mistake made decades ago."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I am following the orders of my mentor, Archmagos Amarnat, and correcting a mistake made decades ago."

languages.text: 「わが師、大賢人アマルナトの命に従い、数十年前の過ちを正しているのです」
languages.original_text: "I am following the orders of my mentor, Archmagos Amarnat, and correcting a mistake made decades ago."

traits.locale_text: 「わが師、大賢人アマルナトの命に従い、数十年前の過ちを正しているのです」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “我正在遵从我的导师阿玛纳特大贤者的命令，纠正数十年前犯下的某个错误。”
languages.original_text: "I am following the orders of my mentor, Archmagos Amarnat, and correcting a mistake made decades ago."

traits.locale_text: “我正在遵从我的导师阿玛纳特大贤者的命令，纠正数十年前犯下的某个错误。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Je suis aux ordres de mon mentor, l'archimagos Amarnat, et j'ai été envoyé pour corriger une erreur commise il y a des décennies. »
languages.original_text: "I am following the orders of my mentor, Archmagos Amarnat, and correcting a mistake made decades ago."

traits.locale_text: « Je suis aux ordres de mon mentor, l'archimagos Amarnat, et j'ai été envoyé pour corriger une erreur commise il y a des décennies. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Estoy siguiendo las órdenes de mi mentor el Archimagos Amarnat, y corrigiendo un error cometido hace décadas».
languages.original_text: "I am following the orders of my mentor, Archmagos Amarnat, and correcting a mistake made decades ago."

traits.locale_text: «Estoy siguiendo las órdenes de mi mentor el Archimagos Amarnat, y corrigiendo un error cometido hace décadas».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Ich befolge die Befehle meines Mentors, Erzmagos Amarnat, und korrigiere die Fehler, die vor Jahrzehnten begangen wurden."
languages.original_text: "I am following the orders of my mentor, Archmagos Amarnat, and correcting a mistake made decades ago."

traits.locale_text: "Ich befolge die Befehle meines Mentors, Erzmagos Amarnat, und korrigiere die Fehler, die vor Jahrzehnten begangen wurden."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Yönderim Başmagos Amarnat'ın emirlerini takip etmekte ve on yıllar önce yapılmış bir hatayı düzeltmeye çalışmaktayım."
languages.original_text: "I am following the orders of my mentor, Archmagos Amarnat, and correcting a mistake made decades ago."

traits.locale_text: "Yönderim Başmagos Amarnat'ın emirlerini takip etmekte ve on yıllar önce yapılmış bir hatayı düzeltmeye çalışmaktayım."
